title: CISA Warns of Active Exploitation of WatchGuard Firebox Out-of-Bounds Write Flaw

content.raw: The Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) has added a critical vulnerability affecting WatchGuard Firebox firewalls to its Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) catalog, warning of active exploitation in the wild. The flaw, tracked as CVE-2025-9242, poses severe risks to organizations relying on these devices for network security. The Vulnerability WatchGuard Firebox firewalls contain an out-of-bounds write […] The post CISA Warns of Active Exploitation of WatchGuard Firebox Out-of-Bounds Write Flaw appeared first on GBHackers Security | #1 Globally Trusted Cyber Security News Platform.
